name: role-roulette
description: An application that assigns and distributes identities / roles to a group of players participating in a secret-role based game.

scripts.client-test: cd client && npm run-script test a
scripts.test: npm run-script server-test && npm run-script client-test
scripts.start: npm run-script build && npm run-script server
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
